name: venoshock
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
short_effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
